text: Royal Caribbean International () is a Norwegian-American cruise ship company based in Miami, Florida. ==Other websites== * Official site * RCI ship history at Fakta om Fartyg (only in Swedish) * F/Y 2006 Report for Royal Caribbean from 10kwizard.com * Independent Royal Caribbean Cruise resource Category:American transport companies Category:Companies of Norway Category:Companies based in Miami Category:Transport in Florida Category:1968 establishments in Europe Category:1960s establishments in Norway
title: Royal Caribbean International
